markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Uncanny Agility](/Feats.aspx?ID=2435) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have near-supernatural poise that lets you move swiftly across the most unsteady surfaces. You gain the [Steady Balance](/Feats.aspx?ID=845) skill feat. You can Step into difficult terrain caused by uneven ground, such as a rocky field or hilly incline.
name: Uncanny Agility
